generalInfo:
This tour package includes comfortable transportation with a 4x4 vehicle in Al Ula and a private vehicle in Dubai, accommodating 2 to 6 passengers as per group size. Enjoy accommodation as outlined in the itinerary, accompanied by an English-speaking local driver to enhance your experience. Entrance fees to museums and key sites are covered.

Meals include 2 dinners and 1 lunch in Al Ula, plus 4 dinners and 2 lunches in Dubai, along with snacks and refreshments throughout the trip.

Please note that international and domestic flights, personal expenses, gratuities, optional tours or activities, and travel insurance are not included in the package.

Inclusions
• Transportation (4x4 in Al Ula, private vehicle in Dubai)
o One vehicle for 2-4 pax
o Two vehicles for 6 pax
• Accommodation as per itinerary
• Local driver (English speaking)
• Museum & site entrance fees
• Meals:
o Al Ula: 2 Dinners, 1 Lunch
o Dubai: 4 Dinners, 2 Lunches
• Snacks & refreshments

Exclusions
• International & domestic flights
• Personal expenses & gratuities
• Optional tours & activities
• Travel insurance

dayInfo.description: Arrival in Al Ula • Airport pick-up • Hotel check-in • Sunset at Elephant Rock • Dinner at the hotel (included)

Explore Al Ula’s Rich Heritage • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Al Hegra (UNESCO site) • Lunch at a local restaurant (included) • Visit Dadan & Lihyanite Kingdoms • Return to hotel • Dinner at the hotel (included)

Old Town & Departure to Dubai • Breakfast at hotel • Explore Old Town AlUla & market • Airport drop-off • Flight to Dubai (excluded) • Arrival in Dubai & transfer to hotel • Dinner at the hotel (included)

Dubai Modern City Tour & Marina Dhow Cruise • Breakfast at hotel • Explore Burj Khalifa, Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, Bluewaters Island • Lunch at a local restaurant (included) • Free time for shopping or optional activities • Evening Marina Dhow Cruise with dinner on board (included)

Classic Dubai Tour & Desert Safari • Breakfast at hotel • Visit Dubai Creek, Gold Souk, Spice Souk, Al Fahidi Historical District • Lunch at a local restaurant (included) • Afternoon Desert Safari – Dune bashing, camel rides, live entertainment • BBQ dinner in the desert (included)
Free Day or Optional Tours • Breakfast at hotel • Free day for relaxation, shopping, or optional tours (Abu Dhabi, Theme Parks, etc.) • Dinner at the hotel (included)
Departure • Breakfast at hotel • Airport transfer for departure
